description:
Ageha’s co-worker and art school student Natsumi suggests that Mashiro enters the “Everyone’s Picture Book” contest. Sora and the gang encourage her, and she decides to try making a picture book.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mashiro no Yume: Saisho no Ippo
The First Step Towards Mashiro`s Dream
ましろの夢 最初の一歩
